document.full_text: gael monfils will take heart from his one paris victory over roger federer when he attempts to block the former world number one's serene progress in the french open quarter-finals on tuesday.
document.title: monfils ready for another crack at federer
lines_and_colors: gael monfils will take heart from his one paris victory over roger federer when he attempts to block the former world number one's serene progress in the french open quarter-finals on tuesday.
